programme.title: Roamin' Holiday
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E10, Doug invites Spence to move in as part of a plan to keep Carrie's annoying friends from spending a weekend.

programme.title: Sparing Carrie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E11, Doug's bowling-team sponsor demands victory, meaning Doug may have to fire his team's weak link: his wife, Carrie.

programme.title: Net Prophets
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E12, Carrie insists on using Doug's Christmas bonus to invest in Internet stock.

programme.title: Party Favor
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E13, Carrie helps Doug plan a bachelor party after she volunteers him to be the friendless Danny's best man.

programme.title: Block Buster
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E14, Doug's memories of his glory days as a football player don't match those of his old teammates.

programme.title: Frozen Pop
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E15, Arthur disrupts Carrie and Doug's lives by moving from the cold basement to the much warmer second floor.

programme.title: Fair Game
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E16, Doug is distraught when he learns that Carrie has been cheating at board games.

programme.title: Meet By-Product
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E17, Carrie and Doug reminisce about how they first met, remembering that it certainly wasn't love at first sight.

programme.title: The Shmenkmans
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E18, Doug and Carrie search for new friends, who do not have children; Arthur rediscovers a breakfast cereal from his childhood.

programme.title: Surprise Artie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E19, Doug tries to keep Arthur busy while Carrie sets up a surprise party for his 75th birthday.

programme.title: Wild Cards
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E20, Doug loses all his money when he goes to Atlantic City with Deacon; Arthur threatens to injure Carrie's boss.

programme.title: Big Dougie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E21, Big Brother Doug tries anything to impress his new protege, including entering a 10K run.

programme.title: Soft Touch
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E22, Doug is duped by Tim into participating in a pyramid scheme that requires him to sell water filters.

programme.title: Restaurant Row
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E23, Carrie bars Doug from eating at his favorite Italian restaurant, but he goes back for lunch and bites off more than he can chew.

programme.title: Flower Power
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E24, Carrie gets jealous of a co-worker who received flowers and accuses Doug of losing his sense of romance.

programme.title: Whine Country
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E25, A coin toss decides the destination for Doug and Carrie's vacation; Arthur and Spence join Doug and Carrie on vacation.

programme.title: Do Rico
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E01, When Doug does the voice of a new co-worker, he feels that Carrie will only listen to him if he does the voice.

programme.title: Roast Chicken
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E02, When Doug's boss sees what a comedian he is, he asks him to "roast" him at his banquet. However, Doug finds that he is not as funny as he first thought.

programme.title: Fatty McButterpants
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E03, When Doug learns that Carrie is buying him clothing from the "Big and Tall Shop", he is determined to lose weight.

programme.title: Class Struggle
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E04, When Carrie spends a night out with some of her colleagues, she finds out that they are more successful then she is.

programme.title: Strike One
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E05, While Doug's company is in strict negotiations, he decides to buy a brand new SUV.

programme.title: Strike Too
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E06, It is week two of the IPS strike, and Doug still has not gotten a job. To get back on his feet, his sister Stephanie get him a substitute teacher job at her school.

programme.title: Strike Out
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E07, Carrie and Kelly plan a get-together for Doug, Deacon and Arthur to keep them from going crazy during the strike.

programme.title: Dark Meet
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E08, Doug, Carrie and Arthur are thinking about the first Thanksgiving they (and Arthur's second wife Lily) spent together.

programme.title: Twisted Sitters
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E09, Doug and Carrie have to watch Deacon and Kelly's kids while they are out of town. When one of the kids sees them having sex, they have to find a way to keep him from saying anything.

programme.title: Work Related
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E10, When Arthur goes to Carrie's work he is offered a job there, which really begins to irritate her. Doug competes to be Mr. May for IPS but Deacon is in the way of him getting it.

programme.title: Better Camera
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E11, Doug buys Carrie a camera for christmas, but her office gives her a better one. Lou Ferigno moves in next door.

programme.title: Wedding Presence
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E12, Doug and Carrie try to go to a wedding but not have to stay.

programme.title: Hi-Def Jam
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E13, Doug convinces his sister to go out with Carrie's boss so that he can go to his house to watch the Super Bowl on his high-def TV.

programme.title: Paint Misbehavin'
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E14, Doug makes Carrie tell him people she knows that she finds attractive, and she says Deacon. Deacon is having a birthday party at a paintball course and it turns into a war.

programme.title: Deacon Blues
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E15, Doug sees Deacon with another woman while he told Kelly he had to work late.

programme.title: Horizontal Hold
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E16, Carrie bans sex for two weeks because she's afraid she and Doug don't talk enough.

programme.title: Inner Tube
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E17, Doug lies to Carrie about having to work late so he can play mud football and get out of going to her seminar.

programme.title: Papa Pill
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E18, Doug feels sorry for Arthur and lets him go to a bar instead of a dance at his senior center. When Carrie finds out she gives Doug full control of Arthur, and Doug realizes how hard it is to deal with him.

programme.title: Package Deal
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E19, Doug receives an offer from FedEx and tells his IPS boss that if he wont give Doug a better route than he will transfer to FedEx.

programme.title: Seperation Anxiety
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E20, During Deacon and Kelly's separation, Doug and Carrie go out with Kelly and run into a guy, Bill, Carrie knows from work.

programme.title: Departure Time
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E21, Doug's parents are coming in town so Doug and Carrie decide to go and pick them up at the airport and they bring upsetting news to Doug.

programme.title: Swim Neighbors
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E22, After a big storm Doug and Carrie catch their annoying neighbors in their backyard cleaning up. Then they give the idea to Doug and Carrie that they should tear down the wall dividing them and make it on big backyard.

programme.title: Dance, Diane, Dance
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E12, Diane is fooled into believing that she's a dance star waiting to happen.

programme.title: Chambers Vs. Malone
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E13, Diane tricks Sam into proposing to her again and she accepts.

programme.title: Diamond Sam
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E14, Diane throws her engagement ring out the window when she mistakes it for a fake.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E15, Diane and Carla console Loretta, who has caught Nick cheating on her.

programme.title: Never Love A Goalie (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E16, Carla falls head over heals for hockey star Eddie LeBec, a newly acquired goalie for the Bruins.

programme.title: Never Love A Goalie (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E17, Carla realizes she's the reason Eddie's hockey game is suffering.

programme.title: One Last Fling
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E18, Diane and Sam agree to a twenty-four hour separation to purge other desires.

programme.title: Dog Bites Cliff
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E19, Cliff files a lawsuit and ends up getting blindsided by the beautiful defendant.

programme.title: Dinner At Eight-Ish
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E20, The regulars meet over dinner to discuss Frasier asking Lilith to move in.

programme.title: Simon Says
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E21, Diane and Sam are given a bleak prognosis from a noted marriage counselor.

programme.title: The Godfather (Part III)
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E22, Sam flips out when his goddaughter visits and agrees to move in with Woody.

programme.title: Norm's First Hurrah
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E23, Norm lies about the prestige of his new position at a CPA firm.

programme.title: Cheers: The Motion Picture
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E24, Woody's parents want him to move back home, but the regulars try to keep him.

programme.title: A House Is Not A Home
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E25, Sam and Diane buy a house from a couple who have been there for forty years.

programme.title: I Do, Adieu
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E26, With Sam and Diane's wedding day approaching, big questions still loom.

programme.title: Home Is The Sailor
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E01, Sam returns to Cheers after sailing around the world and wants his job back.

programme.title: "I" On Sports
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E02, Sam accepts an offer from his friend, sportscaster Dave Richards.

programme.title: Little Carla, Happy At Last (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E03, Carla and Eddie battle superstitions when they decide to get married.

programme.title: Little Carla, Happy At Last (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E04, Carla and Eddie dismiss the unfortunate events that occurred before the wedding as just bad luck.

programme.title: The Crane Mutiny
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E05, Frasier tells his friends about a recent argument with Lilith.

programme.title: Paint Your Office
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E06, Norm agrees to paint Rebecca's office in return for running up his tab.

programme.title: The Last Angry Mailman
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E07, Cliff tries to save his childhood home from getting bulldozed.

programme.title: Bidding On The Boys
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E08, Lilith gets back at Frasier for wanting her to sign a pre-nuptial agreement.

programme.title: Pudd'nhead Boyd
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E09, Woody finds a new admirer when he portrays Mark Twain as an understudy.

programme.title: A Kiss Is Still A Kiss
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E10, Sam encourages Rebecca to tell her boss she has a crush on him.

programme.title: My Fair Clavin
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E11, Cliff gives his girl a makeover and ends up losing her to every other guy.

programme.title: Christmas Cheers
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E12, Sam buys a last minute Christmas gift for Rebecca from another shopper.

programme.title: Woody For Hire Meets Norman Of The Apes
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E13, Robert Urich visits Cheers when Woody makes his television debut.

programme.title: And God Created Woodman
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E14, Sam and Woody take the rap for Rebecca when she breaks a priceless vase.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Cuties
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E15, Carla gives birth to twins, a boy and girl. During Carla's absence, the bar hires two waitresses.

programme.title: Yacht Of Fools
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E16, Mr. Drake invites Sam and Rebecca for a weekend on his yacht. Rebecca still pines for Mr. Drake.

programme.title: To All The Girls I've Loved Before
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E17, Frasier second-guesses his wedding when the guys throw him a bachelor party.

programme.title: Let Sleeping Drakes Lie
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E18, Rebecca gets caught snooping in Evan's room when he returns from Europe early.
